title: Google\Cloud\Core\Retry
name: Retry
description:
Retry implementation.

Unlike Google\Cloud\Core\ExponentialBackoff, Retry requires an implementor to supply wait times for each iteration.

params.name: retries
params.description: Maximum number of retries for a failed request.

params.name: delayFunction
params.description: A function returning an array of format ['seconds' => (int >= 0), 'nanos' => (int >= 0)] specifying how long an operation should pause before retrying. Should accept a single argument of type\Exception`.

params.name: retryFunction
params.description: returns bool for whether or not to retry.

exceptions.description: The last exception caught while retrying.
